website_summaries.verdict: These little allergy-friendly squares are a high protein snack that your dog-in-training can quickly wolf down to prepare for your next task.
pros: Includes healthy ingredients like lamb, carrots, apples, and blueberries
cons: may not last too long for extended training sessions

customer_reviews.title: The very best!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dachshund who will turn 20 (God willing) in June. He has no teeth left - he spent 8 years in a puppy mill receiving no medical attention. However, he continues to thrive now that his needs are being met. These are the only treats I will give him. Sure I can get cheap soft treats in the supermarket with all their artificial colors and ingredients but at this stage of his exceptionally long life, he deserves the very best. Hey, maybe these treats are keeping him going? Who knows? He loves them, gums down without difficulty and is overall a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ross

customer_reviews.title: Wellness loses another customer...
customer_reviews.text: With a name like wellness, you'd think they'd have the dogs interest at heart, but just like almost all the rest, they've got to add things that some dogs can't tolerate... The label says "all Natural" but then they add Smoke Flavoring to the product to lure the owner. Both my dogs develop severe gastritis and diarrhea from "smoke flavorings" and I'm sure they aren't the only two. I give myself the ONE STAR for not looking closer at ingredients list when I ordered. Wellness is another product i can strike off my shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Fauerbach

customer_reviews.title: GREAT soft training treats!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these treats! I've been buying all of the different flavors for my papillons, malinois, and mini aussie for the past few months. These treats are fairly low calorie (8 per square) and very soft and chewy. Easy for senior pets to eat, and great for breaking up into tiny pieces for training. I use these every day after giving the dogs their pills, and at training class with the puppy. Even my most picky dogs gobble all of the flavors up. Definitely recommend these and I've tried MANY, many different kinds. Love the Wellness brand too.
customer_reviews.author: LBowTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treats in my house!
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs favorite treats. I love them because they are easy to tear into smaller bites. I found the other flavors of this brand to be thicker than the lamb and salmon and not as easy to break up if that's an issue for you. Do be careful putting them in your pockets though. They stain. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Another great treat for dogs with food allergies
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these to replace the "Hard as a Rock" WellBars (after the recipe change). These are soft like training treats. Our beagles love them. I got the lamb & salmon recipe since my dogs have food allergies. They seem to love them, and they've had no skin reactions after eating them. They do have a strong smoky smell to them. Just a warning if your dogs don't like that smoked flavoring. I actually had a beagle who wouldn't eat anything that had that smoky flavor. I'll continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: KarenVCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: mostly crumbs
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten several bags of these treats over the course of this year. Two of the last three have been mostly crumbs. The good product I have gotten were a bag full of nice firm squares, like shown at the edge of the picture, that yu can break chunks off of to give the treat a little at a time. But this bag of treats was delivered as a bag of crumbs. I don't know which, but the problem is either; 1) it is just an inconsistent product that sometimes is manufactured poorly, or 2) the product is being badly mishandled at some point in the chain of handling. Either way you just take your chances.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: I've had nothing but good experiences with wellness brand until this sadly but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely which is rare in a natural dog treat in our experience with bully to Marie treats but I wanted a vitamin rich treat to add to my picky yorkies diet. My pup refused to eat them for several weeks and the one time she did she got sick to her tum which may not have been anything wrong with the product but because it made her ill for a couple days we decided not to keep pushing her into eating them just in case. I've had nothing but good experiences with wellness brand until this sadly but I hope you and your furkid have much better results !
customer_reviews.author: dizzygazelleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stewie LOVES these!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a black Lab and a Rottweiler and a Shitzu. We are looking to meet our shih Tzu with a bulldog (haha) Sorry... Seriously though we like to give natural ingredient treats to all of our dogs and are lab and a Rottweiler prefer biscuits but are shitzu is a spoiled little brat and likes softer treats So his mom gives him whatever he wants. he absolutely loves these treats and they are very good for him. He always gets a clean bill of health from our vet with his teeth so, we are very happy with these. So is Stewie
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: Soft with quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My picky blind pitbull LOVES these treats. He only has a few teeth left, so their perfect for him, as they are nice and soft. They are very easy to break apart, for small rewards. He also has a lot of food allergies and intolerances, and does wonderful on these (he's allergic to chicken and beef). I usually pick them up at the pet store when I order his food, but they were out, so I ordered them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They love these but
customer_reviews.text: Good treats, dogs love these, but their butt itches from these, so unless you feed them little, you are ok. I mean they are ok. I like these because they smell really good and soft, easy to stuff some toys and they keep chewing and licking these out for a good 15 min. But if you give these as is, these swallow before you blink.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Soft and perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: These treats are lovely. They're very strong-smelling, which is a good thing for my dogs, because they love them. I use them often for training my service dog. I just break them up into small pieces, and whenever he does something good, he wags his tail happily in anticipation :) I also give them to the other dogs, of course, including the SD when we aren't training. They watch on eagerly when they see me pull this bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal grill in a bag :/
customer_reviews.text: The texture and ingredient list seemed great, but these (as well as several other new types of treats I’ve ordered) have a really strong “natural smoke flavor” smell. I don’t understand why this product is being dumped into so many treats, but I wish they would at least tone it down so that when I open the bag it doesn’t smell like I’m standing next to a charcoal grill! My fur baby won’t touch them, and they aren’t eligible for rerun :/
customer_reviews.author: AmbearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Hard and stale
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of trouble with these Wellness Wellbites lately. I have them on an Amazon subscription plan, so they show up four bags at a time. The last two sets have been completely dry and stale, very unlike the ones I've purchased earlier in the year. They all seem to have an expiration date of 2020, but they are not the soft and fresh treats that I've received in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Graham B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dachshund loves these, but does not like the "turkey" flavor of these treats
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old dachshund and she loves these treats! These are a good size for her and are very moist and have not dried out. She is very picky with treats but she loves these. We did also try the "Turkey" formula and she did not like those, so I think it just depends on what type of flavors your dog likes. I like that these have natural ingredients--these are similar to some dog treats that I picked up at a health food store a while back. Love these and would recommend in the chicken/venison flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought the puppy bites in the same flavor, but looking at the ingredients and calories, these are the same thing but just in a bigger size! So now we just buy whichever one is cheaper per ounce at the time. We buy a lot of treats and my dog loves these more than anything else - he can't resist them. I also use them to give him Benadryl during allergy season - just tear a piece off and push half a Benadryl inside. Photo is of my Jack/Chihuahua mix sitting pretty for a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: According to the dogs that ate these treats, they were a freakin' hit! I work in a dog-friendly office environment and the minute I bust these out, I have hounds surrounding me. They lasted for quite some time as I normally cut them in half, or even thirds, when handing them out for treats. They make your hands smell a little, but a small price to pay when you see the look on a satisfied dog's face.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: All broken into really small pieces
customer_reviews.text: So I normally really like these and so does my dog. However I don’t know if it was the way they were packaged or how it was before being packed but they arrived in horrible shape. All of the pieces where no longer squares but tiny broken crumbles which made it really hard to use as a treat. If this is how they come I would not recommend this product due to how easily they fall apart and become almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these!!! I have been looking for something small and softer for one of my dogs to eat. After having about half his teeth removed I felt that he was having a hard time with regular dog bones and didn't want him to not be able to eat his treats. Making even better they are grain free and natural ingredients. These are soft enough for him and he loves them. Now my dogs are spoiled yet again, but they are so worth it. =) I would highly recommend these soft & healthy dog treats!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Breaks up into crumbs too easily
customer_reviews.text: I loved buying this for my dog before they changed the recipe. My dog still loves the taste, but the squares fall apart. I tear the squares into smaller pieces with all of the Wellness Wellbites flavors, but this one winds up in crumbs and fragments in the plastic bag in my pocket. I'll keep buying the other flavors that are firmer and don't crumble, but I have just canceled my subscription to this one. I just hope they don't apply the same "improvement" to the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jay

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a treat that my dog would highly value for training. The trainer suggested Wellbites. I have never seen my dog be so excited about or work so hard for a treat. These even surpass dehydrated liver. These are soft, that allows me to break them into smaller pieces when training. They have a funky smell, but I think that's what makes them so attractive to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Treats for a very fussy Pom
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for quite some time now. Having a very fussy "High Brow" pomeranian it is always very difficult to find food and treats that are acceptable to her. These, however, are a different matter. She simply can't get enough of them, They are a little large for her so I cut them into quarters (about 3/8 to 1/2" square). They are a soft meat-like texture which works because she wouldn't hear of eating "crunchy" treats, thats for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: prc

customer_reviews.title: Our dog LOVES these treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has never been a picky one for accepting treats but these.... she gobbles them up as I would cheesecake if I didn't have any control. Or sense. She loves these and we make sure we never run out. They are soft treat and easily broken in half if you want to dole them out at intervals. We do that during meals because she stares at us until we fill her pie hole.
customer_reviews.author: Tina in Florida

customer_reviews.title: ChaChi Loves These Treats
customer_reviews.text: Since ChaChi had all his teeth removed last year, I was glad to find these nice soft treats. Although they are too large (about an inch square) to give him a whole one, I break off tiny pieces and feed him each one. He looks forward to getting his treats every day.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite treat is this one right here
customer_reviews.text: This is my dog's favorite treat and cost is never an issue when it comes to spoiling my dog(hter) which means I've just about gotten her any and all the nicest treats out there and besides actual fresh cooked salmon or lamb this is her favorite treat. So I guess I can say that this is her favorite product for dogs that's a treat
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Bone Fragments!
customer_reviews.text: There is a serious problem with these when it comes to quality. I bought these, as well as the Soft Puppybites . As I was cutting them up to use for training treats for my pup, every one of them had bone fragments. I called my veterinarian and they said "Do not give them to your pup!". The bone fragments were very sharp and there were a lot of them. I wish I could apply a ZERO star rating. Apparently it is standard for the fragments to be in the product since both packages contained them.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive bag
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the bag was just crumbled crumbs! This is a picture of what I poured out of the bag! Horrible! These are supposed to be square treats!
customer_reviews.author: Caringmom

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog have bad diarrhea. Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog because the idea of healthy treats is good, but unfortunately after a couple of days of her taking them she started having explosive diarrhea in the middle of the night. What a disaster. Once I stopped the treats the diarrhea also stopped. From now on I will definitely be reading the one star reviews if I ever purchased any sort of food or pet product online again.
customer_reviews.author: Val Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good treats, but are grain free
customer_reviews.text: These treats are a great size and my puppy really loved them because they were very fragrant, however, I do not use them anymore due to the fact that they are grain free. With all of the recent studies that have come out explaining the possible connection between grain free and heart disease, I am avoiding all grain free food and treats. Make sure to only use grain free food and treats if your dog has a known allergy to grains.
customer_reviews.author: joanne ertel

customer_reviews.title: my pup likes them
customer_reviews.text: i have a frenchie puppy i give these to. i dont give the full treat, it's soft so it's easy to cut w/ a plastic knife. i actually sit there and cut them down to a really really tiny piece... this way a bag lasts longer and he's not prone to eating a bunch at a time when im trying to train/praise him.
customer_reviews.author: Louietsang

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: perforated to be ripped into tiny pieces which is nice, flavor is the only other flavor my borzoi puppy likes beside the puppy flavor. I use them for rewards and training and though he is a sighthound breed and can ignore me and food quite a bit, this flavor and the puppy flavor will typically, eventually get his attention. If you forget to close the bag for a bit they don't instantly get hard or weird.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 13 and missing some front teeth so in my search for puppy snacks I found these. HE LOVES THEM! I do not like the smell of the chicken ones, but he enjoys them so it is worth it. The other flavors do not have this smell, so I know its the chicken. They are small, soft squares that he can chew easily. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for stuffing kongs!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a tough chewer and the black kongs are the only thing we've found that he can't destroy. Every night we put 2 or 3 Wellbites in the kong until our dog works them out. Keeps him happy and busy for 30-60 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: booklover123

customer_reviews.title: Dog's like them
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 "granddogs" - one a pedigreed old girl who prefers soft treats and my other girl is a rescue from a severely abusive situation and she is young but also prefers soft treats. They really enjoy these. They are soft enough for the older one to chew and the young one enjoys hers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs/small dogs/easy to chew
customer_reviews.text: I have older dogs and they absolutely love these treats. They are soft and this makes it much easier for older pets to tolerate. They are easily broken in half to share between small dogs. The package is re-sealable and keeps the treats fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive delicious treat for all dogs.
customer_reviews.text: They have a very strong,fresh scent. My dog is a small breed and was over weight so i started giving him these treats twice a day between meals only and no other snacks in between and he lost 6 lbs. I love them he loves them. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sturge

customer_reviews.title: Good for pups with skin allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very sensitive when it comes to certain foods and treats. If I don't read every ingredient, there may be something in there that makes her obsessively itch for days. These Wellness treats have been one of her favorites and luckily there's no allergic reaction. One thing I have found out about these treats is that they'll either be whole/complete squares and other times will be broken up and/or squished into smaller pieces. I'm not sure if that's a shipping thing, but I never really know what I'm going to get until they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love em’
customer_reviews.text: I have these on my monthly auto shipments. My dogs really enjoy them. I’ve never had a problem with them and they always seem fresh
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Hellion

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy treats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 10 year old pup at 1st at a pet store and paid a bit more than but my girl loves them and they are so easy to chew for her. I was excited to save a bit when I found them here on. They are soft and easy tocut up if needed for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Ingredients with No JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: My puppies love these treats. I use them to potty train them. The only drawback to these, and I'm not sure these treats cause this or the food I feed them, is that these puppies farts are absolutely TERRIBLE! Great product though, I know im feeding them good ingredients and thats my favorite part!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft chewy cookies, and my 4 year dog loves them, she is really picky when it comes to snacks, so I was a little hesitant to try a new brand. She also suffers from allergies (chicken), and we've had problems before with other brands, but this one seems to be allergy free and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis the architect

customer_reviews.title: A special treat
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get something for a special treat to train my puppy to (willingly) go into his crate. And I wanted it to be different from the other treats that I use for training him. Well, this did the trick. When he knows it's time to get into his crate, he literally runs to get in it and sticks his head out so I can give him his treat. Works like a charm for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: abc600

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog / soft treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky but he actually loves these. I know if I feed him these all day he will eat them. Sometimes he crys for them. I just dont like that the smell is so strong. U have to was your hands at least 2x.... Now if you dont like being clean than thas nasty and dont buy these. They are healthy too!
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Brown

customer_reviews.title: Doggie treasts for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu loves these. This brand does not make him throw up afterwards. It was a nightmare when I ran out and then bought a different brand a bit less expensive. Oh, gads. The dog got so sick. End of those treats. Got back to using these and was on count down for the product to arrive. We are training him and these are good for him and he likes the taste and does his business where we want him to for his reward.
customer_reviews.author: P. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a healthier dog treat & my dogs absolutely love them! They are soft enough where I can push their heartworm pill through to the middle & they eat it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and soft, wish a few more came in each package
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this bag, I wish a few more treats came in it. We usually rip the treats and have to help us make it through an entire month. I love that these are healthy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Suckow

customer_reviews.title: Smell great to me and the pups. Soft and easy for senior dogs to chew.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried these for the first time. They smell great when opening the package. I let my two little dogs sniff each package before getting the treat of that day.. both instantly got excited! These are soft thin flexible little squares approx 1" X 1" and they LOVE them! These are a win! We will be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Annette D.

customer_reviews.title: Premium dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these and the softness allows for easy breaking treats in half for our miniature Pomeranian. A little pricier than other brands but these have great quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: cardfanvic14

customer_reviews.title: Soft treats my dog loves
customer_reviews.text: Healthy is important, soft is important. My shih Tzu swallows everything, so these cookies are perfect for her. I can hold the cookie and let her bite off small pieces so she won't choke by swallowing it whole. It's a nice size square, about an inch, very soft if you have a dog with being able to chew issues. You can even smush it up for them if you have to. They even smell good.
customer_reviews.author: shihtzu

customer_reviews.title: Pup Favorite
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be the pups favorite by far. They are actually soft and easily chewed which is great for her because she is so impatient :) I wish there was a bit more in the package but otherwise I would by these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: We love Wellness Soft WellBites and their products
customer_reviews.text: We love Wellness Soft WellBites and their products! We normally buy a different flavor for my dog but I decided to try this flavor instead. It was the first time my dog had duck and boy, it does not sit well with his stomach. He definitely had stomach issues from this. So, three stars on the flavor but for the other flavors they well, five stars. Super easy for my senior dog to chew and give as soft treats.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: If I was a dog I'd want these as my snacks all day long!
customer_reviews.text: These are great snacks for dogs...our dog has tried all flavors and she absolutely loves them all. They are moist and tender snack squares that look and smell delicious - if I was a dog I'd want these as my snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Maleetz

customer_reviews.title: One of Lucy's Favorites
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my Jack Russell because these bites are soft and healthy with flax seed in them. Plus Lucy loves them, too. I can feel good about giving these to her and the slices can easily be broken up into smaller pieces even, for training or sprinkled over her food. One of these also seems to satisfy Lucy, too so often times, she does not continue to ask for more snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Rush WomanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loves them, but I think the cost way too much. I got them for his obedience school, but have since switched to boiled chicken breast. I can boil several pounds of chicken for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Sprocket

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Um, he says "woof woof". He can't sit still. His tail is wagging like crazy. I think he loves them. He is not at all on board with only being given one a day tho.
customer_reviews.author: Picklefoot

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd is in LOVE with these treats. They honestly smell like human beef jerky. I’m pretty sure these are our dogs favorite treats.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: My Dog's Favorite Treat
customer_reviews.text: These WellBites are my six year old Jack Russell Terrier's favorite treats. She gets so excited and does spins when she realizes she is going to get one. I break them into small pieces and use them as rewards for tricks. I'm happy that they are healthy treats with good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyna

customer_reviews.title: Soft treat our dogs love that leaves no crumbs!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these! Our neo is very selective when it comes to treats but this is one of the few he won’t turn his nose to. And we feel good giving these treats knowing the ingredients are good for them. The great thing is these treats are soft, not crumbly, so there’s never a mess when our dogs eat them. Because they’re soft treats, it’s really easy to tear them into smaller pieces (great for training sessions).
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: your dog will love u
customer_reviews.text: smells so good i wanted to have one haha. my pup is picky... even with treats, especially healthy ones. he loved these! you can see the pieces of whole foods. i read that these can help with various dental issues! i’ll be monitoring for any changes— hopefully it works.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew and yummy too!
customer_reviews.text: The boys love these treats. My senior guy has arthritis and is missing several teeth, and these treats are easy for him to chew. Both dogs love the flavor, too. Great purchase, will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jannacker

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! We give our dogs each one in bed at night as their bedtime treat. They are small enough to be eaten in one bite, making no mess in our bed. We love how many flavors they come in. I do a fair amount of research before buying treats for our dogs and Wellness is among the best. We order a package of these almost every time we place an Amazon order. Great product and great company!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Old dog can't chew. These are great.
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 year old dog had to have extensive dental work and we thought he may be able to handle these. Not only can he eat them with just ten teeth left, but he loves them. The dog never was a good eater, but he likes these. He's 9 lbs. so we tear them into pieces and they work well for that. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treat for training
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie loves these treats. They are very soft and easy for him to chew, the smell isn't bad either. We use these as treats for training in obedience class and it works well. It comes in about 1 inch squares but easy enough to tear or cut into smaller pieces. His stomach is sensitive but he hasn't had any issues with this, I'd definitely recommend it for other dog moms!
customer_reviews.author: T. T.

customer_reviews.title: they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: my min pin loves these treats and we buy on a regular basis. they are soft and small and perfect for small dogs. they are mad ei the usa and don't have extra chemicals or by-products like other treats that can be harmful for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: What has happened?
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying 6 packages of these Soft Wellness treats per month for years but now this particular flavor is hard as a rock. Are these safe to give to my dog?
customer_reviews.author: Nana Di

customer_reviews.title: If my dogs love em I love em!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats!! They are always fresh and smell absolutely horrid to me but I am not eating them 🤔 They ladies love em and thats what matters!! Great deal and Fast shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: P Haughey

customer_reviews.title: All natural and grain free
customer_reviews.text: Wellness changed their formulation on this lamb and salmon treat, eliminating all grains. Ingredients are: lamb, salmon, apples, sweet potatoes, and blueberries. Fantastic for training and behavioral modification. Even one of our cats enjoys these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Will's Mudder

customer_reviews.title: choking hazard for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these but they pose a serious choking hazard. The flat square shape gets caught in my dogs throat so we have to break them up for her, she has choked to the point of needing the Heimlich twice now so I have to watch her very closely.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Scaff

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a small dachshund who is an extremely picky eater. I have purchased multiple different treats and she refuses to eat them. I decided to buy the soft wellbites and my fur baby absolutely LOVES them. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emi V

customer_reviews.title: They've Changed the Way They Make Them
customer_reviews.text: I know most people probably like them harder and chewier, but my dogs like them better when they were softer.
customer_reviews.author: tyrogers31

customer_reviews.title: Pit puppy turns nonselective nose up!
customer_reviews.text: These have awesome ingredients but my red nose pit puppy turns her nose up at them. Now Tara is NOT finicky, she eats goat poop, rabbit poop, the chicken’s scratch, beetles, crickets and anything lying still, plus anything moving she can catch! Go figure, but just so you know...
customer_reviews.author: The Preptorial Foundation, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Doggies love these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pet sitting business and all the doggies love these treats! They gobble them up. The treats are moist and easy to break up so I can get more pieces from one treat. I would definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: The Munro Gang

customer_reviews.title: Current bag has quality issue.  Quality is usually good.
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten these before and the quality was great. This time they are not as moist as usual and and are crumbling so much I can't use them. I contacted Wellness and they are looking into it. I will be returning this bag to Amazon. Usually quality is great. My dog loves the taste and they are good for training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have Norfolk terriers and I have always bought Wellness food and treats for them. These soft well bites smell good enough to eat!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kong and training
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats. When whole they just fit into the opening of a large Kong. And they are easily torn into small pieces for training. My dog loves them but shes not picky. Ive gotten the salmon flavor before too and its also great. These treats have a strong smell but don’t gunk up your fingers. Wish they were cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: We're also comfortable giving her more of it because it has good ...
customer_reviews.text: The only treat our 6lb toy poodle can't get enough of! We're also comfortable giving her more of it because it has good ingredients, almost no fillers. We've been using this as her only treat, except for some chews, for about 6 months and she still loves it! We're thinking about switching to another flavor but the lamb and salmon one is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Too crumbly vs the old formulation
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying wellness well bites for about 6 years religiously as I love the product (as well as my dog!). I guess I'm okay with the reduced size (i.e. increased price per ounce), but the new formula is drier and is too crumbly to stay in the bones that I previously used. I hope this is temporary as it was a great way to extend the treat by making my dog chew it out of a Kong bone,
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Healthy tasty ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My pup is old and doesn't have many teeth left. This is a healthy product that I can easily tear into little pieces and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LKS

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, I think
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I got these for doggie friends so can’t comment on taste. But if doggie friends’ reactions are a fair judgement, these snacks are the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for yorkies
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie loves these. I rip them in half because she doesn't chew thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: some soft/some not
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the soft Wellbites for years and my dogs love them. Has anyone else had the experience that some packets have all soft and moist treats but others are a totally different texture - like they have dried out and stale? All bags are way before expiration dates. I get really annoyed when I open a new packet and they aren't soft like the last one. My dogs still love them all but I watch them chew the dry ones and you can tell the are tough!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Pup approved!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best treats for our pup! We break them up in smaller pieces and 1 square lasts a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: My pom loves it
customer_reviews.text: I choose the soft bite because I have a pom and I don't want her to chew on hard treats. She loves the soft bite, pretty much every single flavor. I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Jojojoshua

customer_reviews.title: Good, soft, healthy treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft treats that I used when my puppy was teething because they're grain-free and he had trouble chewing hard, crunchy treats. The only reason I haven't given them 5 stars is that being so soft, they come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kj1011

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog love it, and he is very very picky to eat. So, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: OP happy

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treat
customer_reviews.text: Grain free treat that our 17 year old Yorkie will actually eat. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Goofy

customer_reviews.title: but these are by far her favorite! We do have to tear each into smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Puppy crack. Seriously our shih tzu goes crazy for these. We've tried all sorts of treats, but these are by far her favorite! We do have to tear each into smaller pieces though because she tries to swallow whole & chokes on them (8 lb dog).
customer_reviews.author: It's a Tzu

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats and I love them because they are not full of nasty stuff and are grain free. I use these mainly as their "ready for bed" treats but they are also ideal for training and are easy to stuff in your pocket without leaving an odor or crumbs. They work for small and large dogs and are fairly priced
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wade

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats. I break each square ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. I break each square into smaller pieces such that one square usually yields around 10 smaller treats. I carry one or two squares in my pocket every day, and break off pieces as needed.That way, I can give my dog more treats without giving her a ton of calories!
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves them! Just a little big
customer_reviews.text: My 35 lb 1.5 year old Aussiedoodle loves these! They have great ingredients, which we love! He definitely prefers soft treats over hard. To me, the only downfall is the size. They are pretty big. Maybe a little bigger than a quarter, so I typically break them in half before giving them to Bear.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Bates

customer_reviews.title: My dogs fave treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog has 5 diff packs of treats This one he goes crazy for He gives them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: susan dolan

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! He has really bad teeth and had to have multiple teeth removed. They are nice and soft for him to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good snacks
customer_reviews.text: My dog has tongue cancer so chewing is a issue. He likes those soft snacks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Sobczak

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats. They smell funny but the ingredients are much better than many treats I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L Beck

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Natural Wellbites
customer_reviews.text: This item was much enjoyed ,my dog look forward to getting his treats. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: sherry krause

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua not having them
customer_reviews.text: Granted my chihuahua is picky but he sure turned his nose up at these quickly! Sorry!!!! I WANTED him to love them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and my dog loves it. It also has good quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloah Nicolay

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft & chewy! Perfect for my senior rescue dog 🐕.
customer_reviews.author: I love my pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They are a good small size for a bite of something yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Caps Fan

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters won’t like
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a picky eater. He goes crazy for the wellness salmon & lamb flavor so I decided to try this out. They’re bigger treats and easy to break into four pieces. The treats are a lot drier in texture compared to the salmon & lamb flavor. Puppy just spits them right out and or sniffs & loses interest. He prefers his kibble over this, LoL
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves them. Moist.
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves these. I like that they are soft and great for teething or small puppies. They smell good too. Lol. I think it was a few cents less expensive than my local Centinela Pet Supply store. I cut them in quarters for treats and training.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

product_meta.title: Wellness Natural Wellbites Soft Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:6ozWellness Natural Grain Free WellBites Soft Dog Treats are wholesome, all natural, soft, tasty, bite-sized dog treats made in USA only
feature_bullets: MINI CHEWY TREATS: These delicious, grain free soft dog treats are made with two kinds of fresh meat for a flavor and texture your dog will love; they're great for everyday treating, training or snacking
ALL NATURAL: These moist and tasty treats are made with whole fruits and veggies including superfoods like blueberries and sweet potatoes for a naturally craveable flavor and a boost of antioxidants
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: We craft delicious treats with simple, natural, high quality ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits; no meat byproducts, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
FIND THE RIGHT TREATS: From puppy to senior, small dog to large breed, crunchy to chewy, grained to grain free, treating to training, we've got an all natural recipe for every dog's needs and taste

WELLNESS NUTRITION: Created by nutritionists, veterinarians and animal lovers, our recipes provide an ideal balance of nature's finest ingredients, carefully selected to nourish and sustain your pet's wellbeing

specifications.Manufacturer: Mountain Country Foods: Spanish Fork, UT
